title: Ghana Health Services EHR
description: A mobile primary healthcare service engineered to facilitate maternal and child healthcare access in rural Ghana.

title: CogniCents
description: A multifaceted AI-driven solution created to equip everyday users with financial proficiency and market expertise.

title: Time Tracker
description: Web app that lets Brown University students track, visualize, and compare how much time they spend on specific classes.

title: Sticky Sign
description: An IoT environment designed using OpenCV, 3D projectors, and Sticky Notes to create an AR that gamifies learning American Sign Language.

title: CNN Breast Cancer Bias Detection
description: Deep learning model that detects breast cancer diagnosis using patch-based histopathology images up to 80.13% accuracy.

title: Zafra
description: A proof of concept online literary journal, communal idea space, and marketplace designed as a platform for artist collaboration.
